ngiemboon: Cʉ̀apʉ̀a láʼ ńtsẅi ne Mǒonsê ngie:
en: Then the Lord spoke to Moses:

ngiemboon: Gʉa, ńtsẅii mbwó pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ ngie:
en: “Tell the Israelites: When someone sins unintentionally   against any of the Lord’s commands and does anything prohibited by them —

ngiemboon: Nùŋepwɔʼ welÿò gẅie mé la zɔ́ʼɔ yé, zɔ lɔɔn fʉa nò té zsé, ndòon ye é tága láʼa ntsèm, mbà à gẅiin lénáa ndúm fòŋ té lɔ̌ʼ, lélɔg ńdúɔ ngie e Ssé lege mefʉa mé.
en: “If the anointed priest   sins, bringing guilt  # 4:3 Lv 6:5,7; 22:16 on the people, he is to present to the Lord a young, unblemished  # 4:3 Ex 29:1 bull as a sin  # 4:3 Or purification offering  # 4:3 Ex 29:14 for the sin he has committed.

ngiemboon: À ge lɔg fòŋ ŋwɛ́ é tóo ncwò ntàb mbumté, é zába pwó yé na twó fòŋ ŋwɛ́, é zẅé yé, á mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: He is to bring the bull to the entrance to the tent of meeting before the Lord, lay his hand on the bull’s head, and slaughter it before the Lord.

ngiemboon: Anùŋepwɔʼ welÿò gẅie mé la zɔ́ʼɔ yé, à kaa metse ndúm fòŋ ńdɔg ńkúu tsɛ̀ɛ ntàb mbumté.
en: The anointed priest will then take some of the bull’s blood and bring it into the tent of meeting.

ngiemboon: Ńdeen ńké ńcÿɔʼɔ tepwó we tsɛ̀ɛ metse, ńtyé mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, ńza metse ŋwɛ́ za ngʉ̀a sɔɔnmbʉ́a, e cʉ́mte nzème pǐ na lɔgnkʉ́ŋ gẅie mé la lɔg faga jʉʼʉ ndʉalʉ̌a.
en: The priest is to dip his finger in the blood and sprinkle some of it seven times   before the Lord in front of the curtain  # 4:6 Mk 15:38; Lk 23:45 of the sanctuary.  # 4:6 Ex 15:17; Lv 10:4

ngiemboon: À ge gíŋe za metse na mendóŋ mie ée na mezẅé jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ gie mé tuɔ lamendɔ̀ɔn wó, á mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, á ncwò ntàb mbumté. É leen ké pɔ́ɔnte, é pfɛte pfwɔ̀ʼɔ metse á tsìŋe jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ gie mé túɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm wó, á gie áa ncwò ntàb mbumté.
en: The priest is to apply some of the blood to the horns of the altar of fragrant incense   that is before the Lord in the tent of meeting. He must pour out the rest of the bull’s blood at the base of the altar of burnt offering  # 4:7 Ex 3:5; 35:16 that is at the entrance to the tent of meeting.

ngiemboon: À ge pú kẅile mefóon, mie ée na yɛ̌ fòŋ gie mé lɔ̌g ńdúɔ mefʉa: mé lɔgɔ púʼu, ńgɔɔn lékẅile mefóon mie ée na mentú, tà mbɔɔ mie é pwoon shúm lepfòm ŋwɛ́,
en: He is to remove all the fat from the bull of the sin offering: the fat surrounding the entrails, all the fat that is on the entrails,

ngiemboon: é shúm páʼ membaŋnkàʼ mé lé mefóon mie ée mǒ, ńgÿo mefóon mie ée na megwǒŋ nnɛ́ mé, mbɔɔ mefabmbyè mé. Mé púu wɔ́b lâ membaŋnkàʼ mé ńtsɔ́ʼ pɔ́ tàʼ legʉ̀a.
en: and the two kidneys with the fat on them at the loins. He will also remove the fatty lobe of the liver with the kidneys,

ngiemboon: É tsɔ́ʼ ndʉŋndʉŋ páʼ mé tsɔ́ʼɔ na fòŋ lɔg ńdúɔ mbʉ́lè mbwó Ssé. À lɔg ńnuŋe pwɔʼ, á jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ gie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm wó.
en: just as the fat is removed from the ox of the fellowship sacrifice.   The priest is to burn them on the altar of burnt offering.

ngiemboon: É pɔ́ɔnte, é pú kaa kɔ̀ɔkɔ́ɔ gie á vwɔʼɔ́ na fòŋ, mé gɔɔn shúm páʼ ngùb, é mbab, á twó, é mekwò, é mentú lâ kɔ̀ɔkɔɔ́ gie áa tsoló,
en: But the hide   of the bull and all its flesh, with its head and legs, and its entrails and waste #— #

ngiemboon: é lɔg fó jʉʼ gie mé tsẅé wó, é kẅɛ, é gʉa né jʉʼ gie áa ye ndʉalʉ̌a, á jʉʼ gie mé pÿɛɛ pfó gie á kẅɛɛ na mefóon menɔ̀ɔn pie mé tuɔ na jʉʼ gie mé nuŋe pwɔʼ wó. É tóo wó, é maʼa tsɛ̀ɛ mmɔ̌g mekèm nkẅíŋ. Yɛ̌ zɔ̌ɔ jʉʼ gie mé ge tóo wó, é tuɔ sɛ̌ shúm ndùm pfó mefóon menɔ̀ɔn.»
en: all the rest of the bull #— #he must bring to a ceremonially clean place   outside the camp  # 4:12 Lv 8:17; Heb 13:11–13 to the ash heap, and must burn it on a wood fire. It is to be burned at the ash heap.

ngiemboon: Aláʼa Ésàlayɛ ntsèm lɔɔn ńdáʼ ńgʉa na mentÿɔgɔ́ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, éfʉa nò té kwoŋ, mbɔɔ té zsé, á nò gie mé la gɔɔn tà ḿbʉ́, mbà ndòon nò ŋwɛ́ ge kwɔ́ʼɔ wɔ́b.
en: “Now if the whole community of Israel   errs,  # 4:13 Nm 15:22 and the matter escapes the notice of the assembly,  # 4:13 Ex 16:3; Lv 4:21; Nm 10:7; 15:15; 20:6,10 so that they violate any of the Lord’s commands and incur guilt  # 4:13 Nm 5:6; Ps 68:21 by doing what is prohibited,

ngiemboon: Pɔ́ lɔɔn ńzsé mefʉa mɔ́b, mbà pɔ́ ge náa tàʼ fòŋ gẅie aa ndúm lélɔg ńdúɔ mbwó Ssé ngie à lege mefʉa mɔ́b. Pɔ́ ge lɔg fòŋ ŋwɛ́ tó tà kúu mvfò ntàb mbumté,
en: then the assembly must present a young bull as a sin offering. They are to bring it before the tent of meeting when the sin they have committed in regard to the command becomes known.

ngiemboon: melÿò tsɛ̀ɛ láʼ ge tó, wɔ̌wɔ́ɔ nyìŋ wɔ́ɔ na pɔ́b, á zába pwó yé na twó yɛ̌ fòŋ, tàʼ nyìŋ tsetsɛ̀ɛ pɔ́b zẅé yɛ̌ fòŋ mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: The elders   of the community are to lay their hands on the bull’s head before the Lord and it is to be slaughtered before the Lord.

ngiemboon: Anùŋepwɔʼ gẅie mé la zɔ́ʼɔ yé, à gʉa na metse fòŋ ŋwɛ́, ńkẅile tsɔ́ ńdɔg ńtó, ńkúu tsɛ̀ɛ ntàb mbumté.
en: The anointed priest will bring some of the bull’s blood into the tent of meeting.

ngiemboon: É leen ńké ńcÿɔʼɔ tepwó we tsɛ̀ɛ metse, ńtyé mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, ńza metse ŋwɛ́ za ngʉ̀a sɔɔnmbʉ́a, e cʉ́mte nzème pǐ na lɔgnkʉ́ŋ gẅie mé la lɔg faga jʉʼʉ ndʉalʉ̌a.
en: The priest is to dip his finger in the blood and sprinkle it seven times before the Lord in front of the curtain.

ngiemboon: À ge za metse ŋwɛ́ mbɔɔ na mendóŋ mie ée na mezẅé jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ gie áa mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, á jʉʼ gie áa tsɛ̀ɛ ntàb mbumté. É leen ké pɔ́ɔnte, é pfɛte pfwɔ̀ʼɔ metse á tsìŋe jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ gie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm wó, á ncwò ntàb mbumté.
en: He is to apply some of the blood to the horns of the altar that is before the Lord in the tent of meeting. He will pour out the rest of the blood at the base of the altar of burnt offering that is at the entrance to the tent of meeting.

ngiemboon: À ge pú kẅile mefóon mie ée na yɛ̌ fòŋ, é tuɔ jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ.
en: He is to remove all the fat from it and burn it on the altar.

ngiemboon: Ńgwɔ́ gie wɛ̌ nùŋepwɔʼ la gwaa ná ye fòŋ lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa mbwó Ssé, ńgÿo lékɔ́ wɔ́ɔ, á gíŋ ńgÿo ndʉŋndʉŋ pɔ́ páʼ à la gÿo na ye fòŋ ńtí mé mefʉa. Ńgÿo na pʉ̀a Ésàlayɛ páʼ mé gÿo lélɔg ńgɔɔn ngie Ssé legé mefʉa nyìŋ. E Ssé leen ńké ńdege mefʉa mɔ́b ńnáa mbwó pɔ́b.
en: He is to offer this bull just as he did with the bull in the sin offering; he will offer it the same way. So the priest will make atonement   on their behalf, and they will be forgiven.  # 4:20 Lv 5:16; 6:7

ngiemboon: Afʉ̀ʼ kuʼ, á tsẅi mé kaa pfwɔ̀ʼɔ fòŋ ŋwɛ́, ńdɔg fó jʉʼ gie mé tsẅé wó, ńkẅɛ, ńdɔg ńgʉa maʼa mmɔ̌g, ndʉŋndʉŋ páʼ mé tǔɔ mvɔ̀gmvfò. Ée pwɔʼ lélɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa láʼ.
en: Then he will bring the bull outside the camp   and burn it just as he burned the first bull. It is the sin offering for the assembly.

ngiemboon: «Awɛ̌ nkẅèmvfò wɔ́ɔ, lɔ́ɔn ńdáʼ ńgʉa na mbʉ̌, éfʉa nò té kwòŋ mbɔɔ té zsé, á nò gie mé la gɔɔn tà ḿbʉ́, mbà à lɔgɔ ḿbú ńgẅiin mefʉa.
en: “When a leader  ,# 4:22 Ex 34:31 sins and unintentionally violates any of the commands of the Lord his God by doing what is prohibited, and incurs guilt,

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn ńdáʼ ńké ńgwɔ́ tà ńzsé mefʉa we, mbà à ge lɔgɔ tàʼ fÿɛ̀ gẅie lɔ̌ʼ té mǒ wɔ́ é tó,
en: or someone informs him about the sin he has committed, he is to bring an unblemished male goat   as his offering.

ngiemboon: é zába pwó yé na twó fÿɛ̀ ŋwɛ́, é záʼa lóŋ we mvfò Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, á jʉʼ gie mé zẅé shúm pwɔʼ sie mé tuɔ tà é pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm wó, e lɔg ńgwɔ́ pwɔʼ lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa mbwó Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: He is to lay his hand on the head of the goat and slaughter it at the place where the burnt offering   is slaughtered before the Lord. It is a sin offering.  # 4:24 Ex 29:14

ngiemboon: Anùŋepwɔʼ lɔgɔ tepwó we, ńcÿɔʼ metse fÿɛ̀ gẅie mé zẅě lélɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa mbwó Ssé, ńtse na mendóŋ mie ée na mezẅé jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ gie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tá á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm wó, é leen ké pɔ́ɔnte, é pfɛte pfwɔ̀ʼɔ metse á tsìŋe jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ gie mé tuɔ nɔ̀ɔn tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm wó.
en: Then the priest is to take some of the blood from the sin offering with his finger and apply it to the horns of the altar of burnt offering.   The rest of its blood he is to pour out at the base of the altar of burnt offering.

ngiemboon: À ge pú tuɔ mefóon fÿɛ̀ ŋwɛ́, á ndúm jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, ndʉŋndʉŋ páʼ mé gÿo tá ńdɔg ńnuŋe pwɔʼ lélɔg ńdúɔ mbʉ́lè mbwó Cʉ̀apʉ̀a. Nùŋepwɔʼ lɔɔn ńgwɔ́ tà ńgÿo páʼ mé ée ńgÿo lélɔg ńgɔɔn ngie Cʉ̀apʉ̀a lege mefʉa wɛ̌ nyìŋ, mbà Cʉ̀apʉ̀a ge lege náa mbwó yé.»
en: He must burn all its fat on the altar, like the fat of the fellowship sacrifice. In this way the priest will make atonement on his behalf for that person’s sin, and he will be forgiven.

ngiemboon: «Atsɔ̌ nyìŋ tsɛ̀ɛ láʼ lɔ́ɔn ńdáʼ ńgʉa na mentÿɔgɔ́ Cʉ̀apʉ̀a, éfʉa tsɔ̌ tàʼ té zsé, á gwɔ́ nò gie à la gɔɔn tà ḿbʉ́, mbà à lɔgɔ ḿbúu ńgẅiin mefʉa.
en: “Now if any of the common people   sins unintentionally by violating one of the Lord’s commands, does what is prohibited, and incurs guilt,

ngiemboon: Angàŋ lɔɔn ńké ńdáʼ ńgwɔ́ tà ńzsé mefʉa we, mbà à ge lɔgɔ fÿɛ̀ gẅie lɔ̌ʼ té mǒ wɔ́, é tó, é tíi nò gie à ka fʉa mbwó Cʉ̀apʉ̀a.
en: or if someone informs him about the sin he has committed, then he is to bring an unblemished female goat as his offering for the sin that he has committed.

ngiemboon: É lɔg tó púʼu, é zába pwó yé na twó nɔ̀ɔn ŋwɛ́, gẅie mé ge zẅé, é lɔg tÿó mefʉa mbwó Ssé, é zẅé yé pɔ́ jʉʼ gie mé tuɔ shúm pwɔʼ wó, tà é pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm.
en: He is to lay his hand on the head of the sin offering and slaughter it at the place of the burnt offering.

ngiemboon: Anùŋepwɔʼ lɔgɔ tepwó we, ńcÿɔʼ metse fÿɛ̀ gẅie mé zẅě lélɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa mbwó Ssé, é tse na mendóŋ mie ée na mezẅé jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, é leen ké pɔ́ɔnte, é pfɛte pfwɔ̀ʼɔ metse á tsìŋe jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ ŋwɛ́.
en: Then the priest is to take some of its blood with his finger and apply it to the horns of the altar of burnt offering. He is to pour out the rest of its blood at the base of the altar.

ngiemboon: À ge pú kẅile mefóon, á na wɛ̌ fÿɛ̀, páʼ mé kẅile lélɔg nuŋe pwɔʼ mbʉ́lè mbwó Ssé, é tuɔ jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ, agyě kwɔ́ʼ ḿboŋo Cʉ̀apʉ̀a. Anùŋepwɔʼ piŋ ńgwɔ́ tà ńgÿo páʼ mé ée ńgÿo na nyìŋ gẅie e Ssé legé mefʉa mé, mbà Ssé ge lege é náa mbwó yé.
en: He is to remove all its fat just as the fat is removed from the fellowship sacrifice. The priest is to burn it on the altar as a pleasing aroma to the Lord. In this way the priest will make atonement on his behalf, and he will be forgiven.

ngiemboon: Nyìŋ gẅie à fʉ̌a nò, à lɔɔn ńgyá ngie à ge ná pɔ́ njʉ̀njÿò é lɔg lúɔ mefʉa we, á lɔgɔ nzwě gẅie aa té lɔ̌ʼ ńtó,
en: “Or if the offering that he brings as a sin offering is a lamb,   he is to bring an unblemished female.

ngiemboon: é zába pwó yé na twó njʉ̀njÿò ŋwɛ́, é zẅé á jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ lé nɔ̀ɔn gẅie mé ge tuɔ tà à pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm lélɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa.
en: He is to lay his hand on the head of the sin offering and slaughter it as a sin offering at the place where the burnt offering is slaughtered.

ngiemboon: Anùŋepwɔʼ cÿɔʼɔ tepwó we na metse njʉ̀njÿò ŋwɛ́ gẅie mé zẅě, ńtse na mendóŋ mie ée na mezẅé jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ nɔ̀ɔn gẅie mé tuɔ tà á pú shÿó pɔ́ ntsèm. É leen ké pɔ́ɔnte, é pfɛte pfwɔ̀ʼɔ metse, á tsìŋe jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ lɔg ńdúɔ mefʉa.
en: Then the priest is to take some of the blood of the sin offering with his finger and apply it to the horns of the altar of burnt offering. He is to pour out the rest of its blood at the base of the altar.

ngiemboon: À ge pú kẅile mefóon na wɛ̌ nɔ̀ɔn, páʼ mé kẅile na njʉ̀njÿò ńdɔg ńnuŋe pwɔʼ mbʉ́lè mbwó Ssé. É tuɔ jʉʼʉ lenuŋé pwɔʼ shúm pwɔʼ sie mé tuɔ tà é pú shÿó ńtí Cʉ̀apʉ̀a. Anùŋepwɔʼ piŋ ńgwɔ́ tà ńgÿo páʼ mé ée ńgÿo na nyìŋ gẅie e Ssé legé mefʉa mé, mbà Ssé ge lege náa mbwó yé.»
en: He is to remove all its fat just as the fat of the lamb is removed from the fellowship sacrifice. The priest will burn it on the altar along with the food offerings to the Lord. In this way the priest will make atonement on his behalf for the sin he has committed, and he will be forgiven.
